name: Sunraise
description:
In the not-so-distant future, after the world known to humans has been wiped clean and rebuilt, you live in a society that has accepted the new way of life for humankind, where people live in harmony, taking a responsibility of stewardship for the land. It has been hard-fought.

Now is the time to take a break and reflect on all that you have accomplished. Use the guidelines to construct a saga of four poems over four years, either solo or as part of a group of up to 4 people.

This is a tabletop roleplaying poetry game.
